summary: Even design-conscious programmers find large applications difficult to maintain. Come learn about how the recently propounded “Clean Architecture” applies in Python, and how this high-level design pattern fits particularly well with the features of the Python language and answers questions that experienced programmers have been asking. (An update of my un-recorded talk from PyCon Ireland 2013!)
title: The Clean Architecture in Python
